alert.note: Alert for Central Piscataquis; Northern Piscataquis; Northern Somerset; Northwest Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 29 at 2:00AM EDT until October 31 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM MONDAY TO 4 PM EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 6 inches, with locally higher amounts possible across the higher terrain. * WHERE...Central Piscataquis, Northwest Aroostook, Northern Piscataquis, and Northern Somerset Counties. * WHEN...From 5 AM Monday to 4 PM EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.

area.areaDesc: Central Piscataquis; Northern Piscataquis; Northern Somerset; Northwest Aroostook
